Fits nicely considering i have a much larger ribcage. The straps are pretty thick which I also think is neat overall its seems pretty durable!

评论概述: Can confirm the fit isn’t great
评论详情: Even though the straps are adjustable the holes don’t allow for a tighter fit. I’m not super small. I’m 5’2 and weigh 130lbs. Normally I wear small-medium. This harness fit loose and awkward. When I tightened the belt in front, it looked lopsided. It wasn’t expensive so I could put additional holes and cut straps but honestly, if I’m going to do all that work I’ll make my own from scratch. With my limited free time that was exactly what I was trying to avoid. I’m disappointed but I went into the purchase knowing that might be the case as it didn’t offer any fitting measurements.
Unfortunately this is two small for plus size girls I’m a size 16 and this didn’t even close :(
Super cute and versatile. Durable quality for the price. Had to add a few holes to the bottom front strap to make it tighter but that was very easy to do
Really well made. Not sure if it’s leather but I don’t care as it’s cute. Easy to fit and easy to wear. Good buy too!

I wore it only once before the belt ripped. The material is very flimsy. Three stars only because, IT IS cute - but for the price it’s not worth it. I don’t want an item that feels like I’m paying a subscription fee just to wear it once before having to get a new one.

评论概述: Used it for cosplay, very pleased!
评论详情: The only thing was I had to punch in an extra hole for a smaller fit on the top strap, but like, that's no issue at all. Good product, great for cosplay or everyday wear if you're into more of an edgy style.

Yeah, so, even over a couple layers of shorts, this harness is super loose. I’ve tightened every strap to the last available hole, but it’s still too loose on me. I’m probably going to have to punch extra holes in it. There’s a few inches of the straps that just stick out everywhere as well. I don’t want to cut it down, because I don’t want it to look bad, but the way it sticks out doesn’t look good, either, and it runs the risk of catching on any other chains or loose clothing you may be wearing. It does look super cute though, and is very comfortable. I have sensory issues, but the material is soft and not itchy, so I can wear it against bare skin without having any problems.
The item it's self is cute not a fan of no size choices because it was a bit tight despite being stretchy. Also has a funny smell.

评论概述: They still can't get what Plus Size means.

评论概述: Nothing like the picture, entirely too small

Entirely too small for if you wear a size 14-16 in women’s US clothing. The buckle didn’t even reach around my torso. It would probably fit a petite person who wears a small or medium.

评论概述: If you are Big chested it’s a No go
评论详情: So I ordered this because I’ve been watching a TikTok she where’s  harnesses but she looks fabulous absolutize the outfit together but who can afford hundreds of dollars for designer harnesses not me so I decided to Leap on Amazon and purchase a one that was an expensive and look like I can pull it off. Oh man was I wrong it came out of the packaging which was cute had a little note but oh my gosh now be aware I am 5’5 210 DD bonkers. I couldn’t even get a shoulder and arm into it it was so tiny. So disappointed so I had to send it back but they were pretty cool they returned it immediately if you were petite it might work. Yeah if you’re built like a linebacker or a Olympian swimmer the ain’t  for you!!
